svg.text:
Inara readjusted her mask while playing in the park. She was thinking about going back to school as she played.
In a few days schools would be open again. She was feeling a little scared about going back.

As she played, her eyes fell on a strange and lovely stone lying on the ground. She picked it up and held it in her hand. It felt special. She decided to keep it.
When she got home, she kept it carefully next to her bed. She would paint it, as they had done in school once.
